trans-unit.source: Manages the view state of the activity designer and its underlying model items.
trans-unit.target: 管理活动设计器及其基础模型项的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService> and generates a text property that stores and retrieves its value from an associated control’s view state.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService> 并生成一个文本属性，该属性可从关联控件的视图状态中检索并存储其值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> for the state service.
trans-unit.target: 状态服务的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.WorkflowViewStateService" /> with a specified editing context.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的编辑上下文创建 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.WorkflowViewStateService" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: The object whose view state is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其视图状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the view state for a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定对象的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> that contains the view state.
trans-unit.target: 包含视图状态的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow activity <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> associated with the current view state.
trans-unit.target: 与当前视图状态相关联的工作流活动 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
trans-unit.target: 标识所存储的视图状态项的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the view state represented by the specified key and associated with the specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 移除由指定键表示的、与指定模型项相关联的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the view state associated with the specified model item is found and removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了与指定模型项相关联的视图状态并将其移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="modelItem" /> or the <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modelItem" /> 或 <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow activity <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> associated with the current view state.
trans-unit.target: 与当前视图状态相关联的工作流活动 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the complete view state associated with a specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定模型项相关联的完整视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> that represents the view state.
trans-unit.target: 表示视图状态的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="modelItem" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modelItem" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow activity <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> associated with the current view state.
trans-unit.target: 与当前视图状态相关联的工作流活动 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the view state item that is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识所检索的视图状态项的键。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the item that matches the specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 检索与视图状态（它与指定模型项相关联）中的指定键相匹配的项。

trans-unit.source: The item that matches the specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 与视图状态（它与指定模型项相关联）中的指定键相匹配的项。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="modelItem" /> or the <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modelItem" /> 或 <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view state.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示视图状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的词典值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the view state on the parameter instance specified to the dictionary value that is specified.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数实例的视图状态设置为指定的词典值。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow activity <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> associated with the current view state.
trans-unit.target: 与当前视图状态相关联的工作流活动 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
trans-unit.target: 标识所存储的视图状态项的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Stores the item represented by a specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 存储由视图状态（它与指定模型项相关联）中的指定键表示的项。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="modelItem" /> or the <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modelItem" /> 或 <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow activity <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> associated with the current view state.
trans-unit.target: 与当前视图状态相关联的工作流活动 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
trans-unit.target: 标识所存储的视图状态项的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Records the current setting of the item represented by the specified key so that it is available for an undo operation and then stores the item represented by the specified key in the view state of the specified model item.
trans-unit.target: 记录由指定键表示的项的当前设置，使它可供撤消操作使用；然后存储由指定模型项的视图状态中的指定键表示的项。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="modelItem" /> or the <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modelItem" /> 或 <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An event that signals that a change has been made to the undoable view state of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个事件，用于通知已经对控件的可撤消视图状态进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: An event that signals that a change has been made to the view state of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个事件，用于通知已经对控件的视图状态进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the state.
trans-unit.target: 指定状态的名称。
